himalayan_packages: Browse Our Selection of Himalayan Packages
trip_with_us: Customize Every Aspect of Your Trip with Us
get_in_touch: Get in touch for any questions
planTrip_static: By answering a few questions, we'll create a tailor-made itinerary that perfectly matches your interests, expectations, and abilities. Our travel experts will work closely with you to design an adventure that suits your needs and exceeds your expectations.
planTrip_static_right: Design your dream adventure with mountain nepal holidays your one-stop shop for customized travel packages
trekking_images: Check Out Our Gallery of Inspiring Trekking Images
frequently_asked_p: The following FAQs apply to many of the destinations where Expedition Base leads adventures for trekking and expeditions. Below are some general answers that apply to many trips offered by Expedition Base and we will provide you with more specific information for your desired trip on enquiry
thrilling_adventures: Explore the Great Outdoors with our Thrilling Adventures
activities_p_a: If you're looking for an adventure of a lifetime, come and join us on one of our trekking experiences. Explore the great outdoors, meet like-minded people, and create memories that will last a lifetime.
memories: Leave nothing but footprints, take nothing but memories.
cout: Leaving nothing but footprints means that when you leave an area, you should make sure that you do not leave behind any trash or other items that could harm the environment or the wildlife that live there.
